snippet: Representative Kevin McCarthy, the majority leader, predicted that a repeal of the 40-year-old ban would be approved in a vote later this month. Senate passage, however, might be problematic.
abstract: House is readying vote to repeal 40-year-old ban on exporting crude oil; effort will face headwinds in Senate.
lead_paragraph: Representative Kevin McCarthy, the majority leader, predicted that a repeal of the 40-year-old ban would be approved in a vote later this month. Senate passage, however, might be problematic.

headline.main: House Vote Said to Be Near on Repeal of Oil Export Ban
headline.print_headline: House Vote Said to Be Near on Repeal of Oil Export Ban
